format: JavaScript (ES6 module syntax with Playwright testing framework)
description: This is a test script for end-to-end testing of a web application's keyboard interaction features, including node creation, deletion, and shortcut overlays, using Playwright.

methods.name: keyboard add node (N) and delete selection (Del)
methods.description: Tests adding nodes with 'N' key presses and deleting selections with the 'Delete' key, ensuring no errors and UI consistency.

methods.name: shortcuts overlay lists undo/redo indicating keyboard support
methods.description: Tests if the shortcode overlay correctly displays undo/redo options and indicates keyboard support.
